name: Purple Hide
description:
Description:-A fun little game where you have to avoid the guards to reach the opened door. You can hide from them if you hide in front of a purple painted wall
-Game made in 72hs for the JamDNA 13.

Controls:
-WASD / arrows: for moving   
-SpaceBar: Jump
-Left Shift: Walk slowly and hide when possible

Criteria:
-Stealth: The game core mechanic is Stealth. You have to reach the open door without being seen by the guards
-Jump: The game is also a platformer, so jump is implemented aswell
-Purple: The art of the game is based on the color purple. Also, a mechanic have been implemented where you can hide from guards if you are in font of a purple painted wall
-Wham! Sounds: Every time a guard sees you, a "HEY!" sound is played, also a onomatopoeia is displayed
